thread.title: 9 Anime Series You Need to See This Spring | Nerdist
thread.title_full: 9 Anime Series You Need to See This Spring | Nerdist

author: Dan Casey
title: 9 Anime Series You Need to See This Spring | Nerdist
text:
9 Anime Series You Need to See This Spring Posted by Dan Casey on February 22, 2017 Share: Television 
While many of us are currently deep in the throes of the winter of our discontent, we’re right around the corner from the spring of our content. Namely content like brand new anime that is going to be coming our way in a matter of weeks. April showers don’t just bring May flowers; they also come with a deluge of excellent anime offerings for your viewing pleasure. But with so many new and returning shows from which to choose, it can be difficult deciding on which anime is actually worth your time and the shows with which you can develop a tsundere -style relationship. Fortunately, I’ve got you covered and have put together a comprehensive guide for the very best anime you need to put into your eyeballs this spring. With some hotly anticipated titles like Berserk and Attack on Titan making their triumphant and long-awaited return, and visually stunning newcomers like Hinako Note and Clockwork Planet , there’s a little something for everyone. Now if only we had more free time… 
Which spring anime are you most excited to see? What would you add to this list? What are you watching right now? Let us know in the comments below. Image: 
Want to watch The Dan Cave before anyone else? Join Alpha and get early access.

Tired of getting kicked out of restaurants for being topless? Buy a The Dan Cave t-shirt ! 
Dan Casey is the senior editor of Nerdist and the author of books about Star Wars and the Avengers . Follow him on Twitter and ask him about all things anime ( @Osteoferocious ). Tags
